sentence: What happens when you drive an expensive german luxury car into a tree your mercedes bends
explanation: The word bends refers to the act of bending in terms of physical form as well as to the vehicle being damaged or twisted
first_new_sentence: My father said he needs to bend the metal pipe in the garage.
second_new_sentence: The cars frame bends easily if it gets into an accident.

sentence: How do you add up a mountain? you summit
explanation: The word summit can refer to the highest point of a mountain as well as a meeting or conference
first_new_sentence: We aim to reach the summit of Everest next year.
second_new_sentence: The leaders will gather for a summit to discuss climate change.
